titleStmt.title: Democritus, or Doctor Merry-man his medicines, against melancholy humors. Written by S.R.
titleStmt.author: Rowlands, Samuel, 1570?-1630?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by William Jaggard] for Iohn Deane, and are to be sold at his shop at Temple-barre, vnder the gate,

notesStmt.note: Imprint date (cropped in both copies known) and printer's name from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
